{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi |revision=Mini (R1CM) |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=02/2014 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QG-BCF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Low Noise Amplifier (LNA);Infineon;R3S;;2; |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX, Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 |oui=64:09:80 |oui_eth=64:09:80 }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi Mini R1CM}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifimini/ Product page] (CN)
*[http://bigota.miwifi.com/xiaoqiang/rom/r1cm/miwifi_r1cm_firmware_5def5_2.17.100.bin Dev FW]
Installation procedure: *[https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/miwifi_mini ''Xiaomi MiWiFi Mini'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
Relevant threads: *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=54987 ''Installing OpenWrt in Xiaomi Wifi Mini'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=58770 ''Improving Chaos Calmer 15.05 on MiWiFi'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
Wi-Fi patch: *[https://github.com/lede-project/source/commit/b367eef21dccbc5115778001955847ac3af47db8 ''mac80211: rt2x00: add support for external LNA on MT7620'']
